</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> In <template><title>arma2</title></template> and since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.63.136889, this command sets unit into incapacitated state.<br>
[[lifeState]] results:
* <template><title>arma2</title></template>: "UNCONSCIOUS"
* <template><title>arma3</title></template>: "INCAPACITATED"

<template lineStart="1"><title> Feature arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Animation played while incapacitated depends on the injuries received.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[setUnconscious]] set </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> set: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[setUnconscious]] true;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lifeState]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
